page.title: 12LIMERIGG DOG BREEDING 2
page.content: Dogs must be at least 6 months old and be registered at the "Kennel Club" before they can enter a class at a show. Rosettes are given for the best four in:"Best of Breed","Best Puppy Special","Best in Group","Best in Show", and "Reserve Best in Show" and for the best six in the"Junior Handling classes". I often enter "Junior Handling classes". I sometimes show my own dogs,but I also ask other exhibitors if I can show their dogs. I have been lucky enough to win many prizes and I enjoy making new friends who share my interest in dogs.
